summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 13 priority open recommendations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development as of June 2021. For example, HUD should review how...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Housing and Urban Development
